ComicInfo.Summary:
American Pasttimes: Part Two: In the course of his investigation into Arnie Tate's disappearance, Firearm helps Hardcase take down some armored art thieves. Firearm discovers that all those who have "disappeared" had been overweight. The Sportsmen defeat and capture him.
I: The Hunted: Rune kills Alec Stone after he discovers the corpse of Phillips.
Last Part: Magnor defeats masked criminals but destroys an art collection in the process.
ComicInfo.Title: American Pasttimes: Part Two; I: The Hunted; Last Part
